thread.title: Too Faced teased a new Unicorn Tears lipstick product, and we are going crazy
thread.title_full: Too Faced teased a new Unicorn Tears lipstick product, and we are going crazy

author: Amanda Grace
title: Too Faced teased a new Unicorn Tears lipstick product, and we are going crazy
text:
Too Faced teased a new Unicorn Tears lipstick product, and we are going crazy What a day to be alive! Too Facedâ€™s wildly popular Unicorn Tears lipstick is our go-to when we want to feel like fairy princesses. Jerrod Blandino of Too Faced is like the Willy Wonka of the makeup world, constantly creating sweet cosmetics that we canâ€™t wait to stock up on. Jerrod just teased the newest dazzling product , a melted â€˜Unicornâ€™, on his Instagram.
While the original Unicorn Tears ($22) is a La CrÃ©me iridescent lipstick, this new version looks much different. Rather than an icy blue hue, Too Faced is mixing up what looks like a violet gunmetal shade. The mixing video was teased over a month ago, and now we are getting the first look at the packaging, so expect an official product announcement very soon!
Will it be a gloss or a liquid lipstick?
